Package org.apache.calcite.plan

Interface Context

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Wrapper
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Contexts.ChainContext, Contexts.EmptyContext, Contexts.WrapContext, SqlAbstractGroupFunction, SqlAggFunction, SqlAnyValueAggFunction, SqlAvgAggFunction, SqlBitOpAggFunction, SqlCountAggFunction, SqlCovarAggFunction, SqlFirstLastValueAggFunction, SqlGroupIdFunction, SqlGroupingFunction, SqlGroupingIdFunction, SqlHistogramAggFunction, SqlJsonArrayAggAggFunction, SqlJsonObjectAggAggFunction, SqlLeadLagAggFunction, SqlMinMaxAggFunction, SqlNthValueAggFunction, SqlNtileAggFunction, SqlRankFunction, SqlRegrCountAggFunction, SqlSingleValueAggFunction, SqlSumAggFunction, SqlSumEmptyIsZeroAggFunction, SqlUserDefinedAggFunction
    public interface Context
extends Wrapper
    Provides library users a way to store data within the planner session and access it within rules. Frameworks can implement their own implementation of Context and pass that as part of the FrameworkConfig.

    Simply implement the Wrapper.unwrap(java.lang.Class<C>) method to return any sub-objects that you wish to provide.

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from interface org.apache.calcite.schema.Wrapper

        unwrap
